dy_cost.componentleveltooltip: Cost||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} in order to research this technology.

dy_research_rate.componentleveltooltip: This is the speed at which you can research technology. Research rate can be increased via buildings, character traits and skills.
